Headline: #43 43rd Temporary Westbound Reroute near 43rd/Vincennes
ShortDescription: Westbound 43 43rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 43rd, Saint Lawrence, 42nd, King Drive, and 43rd due to, street blockage near 43rd/Vincennes.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #43 43rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 43rd, Saint Lawrence, 42nd, King Drive, and 43rd due to, street blockage near 43rd/Vincennes.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #29 State Temporary Reroute near State/58th
ShortDescription: 29 State buses temp. rerouted NB: State, 59th, Wentworth, 55th, & State; SB: State, 55th, Wells, 59th, & State, due to street blockage near State/58th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#29 State buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near State/58th, due to street blockage.

Northbound buses will operate via State, 59th, Wentworth, 55th, & State.

Southbound buses will operate via State, 55th, Wells, 59th, & State.

Allow extra travel time.
